T13D4307:8b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T13D4307:8b-8: sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs nad sel de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T13D4307:8b-9: 'phags pa'i brtul zhugs drang srong ma gtogs skyes bu blo ldan pas //
T13D4307:8b-10: rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod spyad bag bya spyod lam gyis //
T13D4307:8b-11: mi lus 'di thob don yod 'tsho ba'i don tsam bstan par bya //
T13D4307:8b-12: 'dod khro gti mug gsum las rlung mkhris bad kan gsum srid de //
T13D4307:8b-13: lus yul dus la sogs pa kun dang bde bcas dbang bsgyur zhes //
T13D4307:8b-14: drang srong chen pos gsungs phyir de yi khyad par mdor bstun nas //
T13D4307:8b-15: tshul rtags zas dang gnas dpyad dgongs pa nyi tshe 'dir brjod pa //
T13D4307:8b-16: lus rtsub skems sems rgod tshig mang grang rlung gi mi //
T13D4307:8b-17: dmar ser blo rno khro la drod che dri can mkhris pa'i mi //
T13D4307:8b-18: dkar snum tshig g-yung lci la drod chung gnyid chung bad kan mi //
T13D4307:9a-0: @9a * // gnyis dang gsum du 'dres pa yang ni de las shes par bya //
T13D4307:9a-1: rgan dang dar dang byis pa rim gyis lta zhing shes par bya //
T13D4307:9a-2: ngad can grang ba rlung gi yul te tsha gdung mkhris pa'i sa //
T13D4307:9a-3: rlan can snum bag bad kan yul te 'dres pa
T13D4307:9a-4: de las brtag nang par srod ni bad kan tho
T13D4307:9a-5: rangs phyi dro rlung gi dus //
T13D4307:9a-6: nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed mkhris pa'i dus yin shes par bya //
T13D4307:9a-7: dpyid na bad kan ldang ste dbyar stod rlung sogs ston mkhris ldang //
T13D4307:9a-8: dbyar smad rlung ldang mkhris sogs dgun stod dgun smad bad kan sogs //
T13D4307:9a-9: ston ni rlung zhi dgun stod mkhris zhi dbyar smad bad kan zhi //
T13D4307:9a-10: lus yul dus dag brjod nas bro drug khyad par mdor bstan pa //
T13D4307:9a-11: mngar kun bsil te bad kan skyed de rlung mkhris sel byed na //
T13D4307:9a-12: zhun mar bu ram snying gzer gze ma gro dang starka dro //
T13D4307:9a-13: mu ka sbrang rtsi skam sa'i sha dang nas dang bu ram rnying //
T13D4307:9a-14: bad kan sel te nye shing ram nye bad kan mi skyed snyoms //
T13D4307:9a-15: tsha ba dro ste mkhris skye rlung dang bad kan sel byed na //
T13D4307:9a-16: srog chags mkhris pa mkhris sel na le sham ni rlung yang skyed //
T13D4307:9a-17: skyur kun dro ste mkhris pa skyed cing bad kan rlung sel na //
T13D4307:9a-18: skyu ru ra dang bal po se'u ni mkhris pa sel bar byed //
T13D4307:9a-19: ku shu mngar ni bsil la dar ba chus bslad mkhris mi skyed //
T13D4307:9a-20: kha ba bsil te rlung skyed bad kan mkhris pa sel byed na //
T13D4307:9a-21: shu dag sle tres dro ste 'phrod dang sbyar na rlung yang sel //
T13D4307:9a-22: bska ba kun ni bsil te rlung skyed bad kan mkhris sel na //
T13D4307:9a-23: aa ru ra ni nyes pa gsum pa gnod mi byed de snyoms //
T13D4307:9a-24: chang ran bad kan rlung sel mang na mkhris pa skyed par byed //
T13D4307:9a-25: lan tshva dro ste rlung sel bad kan mkhris pa skye byed na //
T13D4307:9a-26: rgyam tsha lce myang tsha ni mkhris pa las yang gnod mi byed //
T13D4307:9a-27: mngar dang bska dang lan tshva gsum yang rim bzhin mas lci ste //
T13D4307:9a-28: skyur dang tsha dang kha ba gsum ni de bzhin mar zhing yang //
T13D4307:9a-29: kha ba bska dang lan tshva gsum yang rim bzhin mas rtsub ste //
T13D4307:9a-30: mngar dang skyur dang tsha ba gsum yang de bzhin mar zhing 'jam //
T13D4307:9b-0: @9b rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka 'dra ste nyid kyis nyid skyes pas //
T13D4307:9b-1: lus dang yul dus zas spyod tshul gcig 'dom na nad ldang ste //
T13D4307:9b-2: ji ltar mthun par 'phrod sbyar rlung mkhris bad kan mi ldang phan //
T13D4307:9b-3: de phyir 'phrod dang mi 'phrod la sogs tshul bzhin 'dir bstan pa //
T13D4307:9b-4: rlung ni mngar snum lci dro 'phrod de rtsub yang bsil mi 'phrod //
T13D4307:9b-5: mkhris pa kha mngar bsil dang 'phrod de tsha skyur dro mi 'phrod //
T13D4307:9b-6: bad kan snum lci bsil dang mi 'phrod rtsub tsha spyod dang 'phrod //
T13D4307:9b-7: de bas rang gi lus dang dus gnas zas dang 'phrod spyad phyir //
T13D4307:9b-8: dpyid zla gnyis ni bad kan bskyed dus yin te nad ldang bas //
T13D4307:9b-9: bad kan drang zhing bkru sman skyug sman btang zhing chu tshan btung //
T13D4307:9b-10: gro nas bsreg sha sbrang rtsi la sogs rtsub bska yang ba bza' //
T13D4307:9b-11: sbrang chang rgun chang sga chu sbrang chu bu ram chang nyid btung //
T13D4307:9b-12: mar tshil la sogs snum lci kha ra skyur po tsha phrom dag ;
T13D4307:9b-13: / mngar 'jam skyur na bsil bag yang zhing nyin par log mi bya //
T13D4307:9b-14: chu tshas lus bkru mnye zhing las bskyod ba cag bya ci ran bya //
T13D4307:9b-15: gnas kyang ha cang mi tsha mi grang ran dro
T13D4307:9b-16: grib mar 'dug dbyar stod zla gnyis ma 'bri dus
T13D4307:9b-17: yin nyal po drag shul spang //
T13D4307:9b-18: dal dub mi bya bag 'bras 'o ma mar sar sha dag bza' //
T13D4307:9b-19: bu ram tshil ni cung zad bza' ste chang nyung yang ba btung //
T13D4307:9b-20: 'o ma bskol grang kha ras btab dang dar ba 'thungs na phan //
T13D4307:9b-21: lan tsha skyur zhing na le sham la sogs pa tsha skyur spang //
T13D4307:9b-22: chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru sgra snyan mnyan zhing gdags ;
T13D4307:9b-23: / char par reg bya nyin par tsog bur gnyid kyis log na phan //
T13D4307:9b-24: gnas kyang ser bu drag po'i ngad med dro min
T13D4307:9b-25: bsil bar 'dug / dbyar smad zla ba gnyis na
T13D4307:9b-26: mkhris pa sogs shing rlung ldang ste //
T13D4307:9b-27: phyi rol tsha la lus kyi nang grang nad gsum g-yos pas na //
T13D4307:9b-28: rlung nad bsal phyir lus mnye snum bsku sman chu bskol bas bkru //
T13D4307:9b-29: rlung nad sel des til mar mas gtong dugs dang lums kyang bya //
T13D4307:9b-30: zas kyang ha cang tsha min mngar skyur med par ran par sbyar //
T13D4307:9b-31: pho ba drod skyed bag dang mar tshil sbrang rtsi bar 'ga' bza' //
T13D4307:10a-1: 'bras chan mar khus blugs dang zan dron sha dag bza' //
T13D4307:10a-2: chang yang cung zad btung ste chu dang chu grog spang bar bya //
T13D4307:10a-3: rlan la mi 'dug mi 'gro lus la char pas gsher mi bya //
T13D4307:10a-4: stobs dang drag shul ngal zhing dub par gyur pa'i bag dang yang //
T13D4307:10a-5: nyin mtshan mi bde nyin par mi log nyal po brtun byed spang //
T13D4307:10a-6: gnas kyang rlan med rlung mi ldang la bsil bar
T13D4307:10a-7: stan bting 'dug / ston zla gnyis ni mkhris pa
T13D4307:10a-8: skye ba'i dus yin nad ldang bas //
T13D4307:10a-9: bsil mngar bkru sman gtang zhing gtar kas khrag kyang ci ran dbyung //
T13D4307:10a-10: kha zhing mngar la bsil ba'i sman yang rtag tu bza' bar bya //
T13D4307:10a-11: dus 'di'i chu ni dug med gtsang dang bkrus shing 'thungs na phan //
T13D4307:10a-12: zas kyang 'bras nas sran ma sbrang rtsi kha ra sha la sogs //
T13D4307:10a-13: mngar zhing kha la yang ba mar sar 'o ma bza' zhing btung //
T13D4307:10a-14: chang lci drag po'i ro yod mi btung ra ror mi bya ste /
T13D4307:10a-15: tshil dang til mar mi bza' zil par mi 'gro 'dug mi bya //
T13D4307:10a-16: tsha ba'i zas dang yul yang zla grogs yid du 'ong ba bsten //
T13D4307:10a-17: chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru gos kyang dri ma med pa bgo //
T13D4307:10a-18: rgyan dang dri zhim lus la gdags shing nyin mtshan mi bde ste //
T13D4307:10a-19: gnas kyang dro min ser bus mi phog bsil bag
T13D4307:10a-20: can la 'dug / dgun stod dgun smad zla bzhi
T13D4307:10a-21: phyi grang nang tsha bad kan sogs //
T13D4307:10a-22: gos dror bgo zhing rlan dang lhags pa bag bya nyi ma'ang 'di //
T13D4307:10a-23: zas kyang sha tshon rus khu mar tshil snum bag 'grangs par bza' //
T13D4307:10a-24: mngar skyur lan tshva drod bag cher bza' gsar tog 'bru dag bza' //
T13D4307:10a-25: ran par sna tshogs chang btung ngal ba'i las dag byas kyang sla //
T13D4307:10a-26: rtsel bcag lus sbyang skabs skabs mgo lus til mar bsku zhing mnye //
T13D4307:10a-27: de rjes skyu ru ra la sogs pa sman bskol chus kyang bkru //
T13D4307:10a-28: gnas kyang bsro khang dron por me dang stan stug
T13D4307:10a-29: ldan par 'dug / dbyar stod tsha dus dbyar smad
T13D4307:10a-30: rlung dus bkru sman mi gtang ste //
T13D4307:10a-31: dgun stod dgun smad grang dang rgas la skyug sman gtar ga spang //
T13D4307:10b-0: dgun gnyis dbyar stod lums dugs mi bya @10b nad kyis gzir kyang sla //
T13D4307:10b-1: de ltar yin yang lus dang nad du gar mthun brtsam par bya //
T13D4307:10b-2: rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod pas 'tsho ba'i mdo brjod nas //
T13D4307:10b-3: bag byed spyod lam can dag ring du 'tsho phyir yang bstan pa //
T13D4307:10b-4: med smra cir yang chos dang rigs pa gzhan dag gsum la 'dzem //
T13D4307:10b-5: sngar byas nang nub bsam zhing skyor dor phyin chag bag cher bya //
T13D4307:10b-6: byed pa gang la rdul med rang nyam med cing 'dod chen spang //
T13D4307:10b-7: nga rgyal lang tshos spyi brtol che min shes dman khum mi bya //
T13D4307:10b-8: sdig grogs spang zhing dge bshes bsten te gtong smos dge bcu spyad //
T13D4307:10b-9: gsong des tshul chags gzhan la gnod min mi la byams par bya //
T13D4307:10b-10: lha dang rgyal por nyer bsam lung mnyan yid dang mthun par sgrub //
T13D4307:10b-11: rgyal po'i sras dang rma ni chung yang mi brnyas bag cher bya //
T13D4307:10b-12: spyod lam sgyu mas mi bslu bka' khrims yul chos bsrung //
T13D4307:10b-13: gzhan gyi dpyas skyon mi brjod rtog 'dod gtum chos 'gran mi bya //
T13D4307:10b-14: dge slong slob dpon pha ma'i gong du mi 'gro sri zhu skyed //
T13D4307:10b-15: dge sbyong drang srong srog chags ya mtshan mnyan gtod sbrul mi rtse //
T13D4307:10b-16: ma rtogs shing chen mchod rten drung dang lam mdo phug stod dang //
T13D4307:10b-17: sems can mang du bsad pa'i slo sa dur khrod nyal mi bya //
T13D4307:10b-18: gnyan pa'i mtsho dang chu mig bzang por mi bkru mi bshal te //
T13D4307:10b-19: rdo shing dgon pa'i shing chen mi bcad pha bong gzhom mi bya //
T13D4307:10b-20: mchod rten rgyal mtshan aarga'i grib ma mandal mi 'gong zhing ;
T13D4307:10b-21: / mi ro gtor ma yas stags hom khung thal khung bcag mi bya //
T13D4307:10b-22: nam mkha' ban bun nyi ma phyed dang dmar thag chad pa'i tshe //
T13D4307:10b-23: mi bza' mi btung yi ge klog min nyal po las dang yang //
T13D4307:10b-24: nyi ma la sogs 'od zer phra sngags mi ring ring mi blta //
T13D4307:10b-25: lha khang sgor mi nyal te ri sna grog snar gnas mi bca' //
T13D4307:10b-26: ya mtshan shes drag mi bsten bud med ngag mi mnyan //
T13D4307:10b-27: bud med rgan la mi rgyo rtsal rgyos smra 'gros dub mi bya //
T13D4307:10b-28: gang mo che zhing ring du dgod dang dud mo drag po spang //
T13D4307:11a-0: rtag tu mi 'dug ring du mi 'greng @11a * //
T13D4307:11a-1: ci nus ran par bcag / sbrid pa lud pa khu chu mchi ma snabs 'phyen bshang gci dbyal //
T13D4307:11a-2: mi dgag ma bsgrus bkres skom nad gnyid gnag min myur du bsal //
T13D4307:11a-3: nyal po skigs pa lud pa la sogs tshe lus mjang mi gcu //
T13D4307:11a-4: glal na kha dgab sbrid pa smra tshe ha cang kha mi bgrad //
T13D4307:11a-5: sen mo ring du mi bzhag bregs te phan tshun brud mi bya //
T13D4307:11a-6: mgo lus lag pas mi brdab mgo bo drag tu mi sprugs te //
T13D4307:11a-7: don med sa mi bri zhing lag pa mi brdab mchu mi bri //
T13D4307:11a-8: mi nus bzhin du ci mi gdags te mya ngan gnan mi bya ;
T13D4307:11a-9: / dpyid dang dbyar stod ston ni phyugs mar dus bzhin til mar gyis //
T13D4307:11a-10: rtag tu mgo dang rkang mthil bsku zhing bar bar lus kyang bsku //
T13D4307:11a-11: ston dpyid ma yin dus gzhan res 'ga' sna dang rna bar til mar blugs //
T13D4307:11a-12: skyer pa'i khanda stang zil dag gis bar bar mig kyang bsku //
T13D4307:11a-13: rtag tu lus kyi byi dor bya zhing sman sngags rin chen gdags //
T13D4307:11a-14: ser bu drag po mi ro'i dri dang dud pas phog mi bya //
T13D4307:11a-15: chu tshas mgo lus mi bkru bkru sman skyug sman gtang ba dang //
T13D4307:11a-16: cham pa ma zhus btab ste mgo lus mi bkru snum mi bsku //
T13D4307:11a-17: skya rengs shar nas tsog pur 'dug ste de ring ci bya bsam //
T13D4307:11a-18: langs nas so shing bca' zhing kha yi skyon bsal lag gdong bkru //
T13D4307:11a-19: de nas sman mchog aa ru ra ni rtag zos bdud rtsi yin //
T13D4307:11a-20: lug gi mar min mar sar zhun mar rgas sra tshe ring ste //
T13D4307:11a-21: 'di la sogs pa lus dang tshe la phan pa'i sman zos na //
T13D4307:11a-22: byug pa rgyan dang gos kyis shin tu mdzes byas lha yang mchod //
T13D4307:11a-23: de nas sri zhu'i gnas dang 'khor la snyan brjod 'dzum bstan nas //
T13D4307:11a-24: rje dpon las dang bdag gzhan don la nan tan brtson 'grus skyed //
T13D4307:11a-25: dus bzhir dro bab ran par zas bza' ngoms par skom 'thung ste //
T13D4307:11a-26: thug pa khu tshan la sogs snum lci drod kun sngar bza' zhing //
T13D4307:11a-27: 'bras la sogs pa bsil yang phyis bza' 'phrad med phye ma 'gam //
T13D4307:11a-28: bab chol ha cang 'grangs par bza' min myos par chang mi btung //
T13D4307:11b-0: 'bras kyis 'grangs rjes phye zan mi bza' @11b drod rjes skom mi btung //
T13D4307:11b-1: skyo ma ran par 'thungs na lus brta nang na rgan la bsod //
T13D4307:11b-2: bro drug gang yang gcig la cher zos nad ldang ran par sbyar //
T13D4307:11b-3: 'grangs pa'i rjes la nyal po bang stobs rta rgyug la sogs spang //
T13D4307:11b-4: shing tog ldam ldum mang na nad ldang ba mos phog pa gnod //
T13D4307:11b-5: dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes la ldam ldum bza' drag nad du gyur //
T13D4307:11b-6: nad can lums kyis drangs te mgyogs na nad ldang skran du 'ong //
T13D4307:11b-7: mchin pa g-yer ma spangs te zos na cung zad snying la gnod //
T13D4307:11b-8: zas mchog sbrang rtsi mar rnying cha mnyam zos na dug bzhin gnod //
T13D4307:11b-9: mi mnyam che chung byas kyang zos rjes chang du 'thungs na gnod //
T13D4307:11b-10: ma langs zho dang langs ma thag gi zho dron nad kun slong //
T13D4307:11b-11: chu bya dbyar spang ldum mchog ke'u ni dbyar zla 'bring po'i sman //
T13D4307:11b-12: sman 'thungs sha pa'i sha gnod ga gon zho 'drer rims su 'gyur //
T13D4307:11b-13: btsong bsregs sbrang rtsir mi 'phrod lhan cig zos na 'chi bar 'gyur //
T13D4307:11b-14: ke'u 'am gnag sha lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur //
T13D4307:11b-15: dgun stong rgya g-yer zos na snying ni drags na mig kyang mdongs //
T13D4307:11b-16: mar tshil zos dang mi 'phrod lha ba bza' drags na so 'byung //
T13D4307:11b-17: bra bo mang du zos na rlung dang lus g-ya' ste //
T13D4307:11b-18: nub mo chu 'thung chang gnon la phug rnyid dang sha skam spang //
T13D4307:11b-19: nya dang kha tsha mar tshil mi 'phrod snod kyang gcig mi bya //
T13D4307:11b-20: nya dang 'o ma lhan cig mang zos nang na zer ma gnod //
T13D4307:11b-21: shing tog chang la sogs te skyur dang shang tshe la phug rlon ;
T13D4307:11b-22: / nyungs rnying 'di rnams gang yang 'o mar 'phrod min mang zos gnod //
T13D4307:11b-23: 'o tshan 'thungs rjes chu grog 'thungs dang rgya sran nag po gnod //
T13D4307:11b-24: zla ba spyang kis zin tshe zan zos so na shu ba 'byung //
T13D4307:11b-25: gnag sha rta sha lhan cig zos na lus la g-yan pa 'ong //
T13D4307:11b-26: gnag sha phag sha lhan cig zos na lho yi srin bur 'gyur //
T13D4307:11b-27: nya dang khyim bya'i sha gnyis lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur //
T13D4307:11b-28: khyim bya'i sgo nga'i spri dang sgog skya zos na dbugs mi bde //
T13D4307:11b-29: khyim bya'i sha dang ri bong sha gnyis lhan cig zos na cung zad 'khru //
T13D4307:12a-1: nang du brdos pa zos na lus la gnod //
T13D4307:12a-2: ma nu'i sa bon ka tsam sbrang rtsir 'phrad ma yin //
T13D4307:12a-3: la phug bu ram mi 'phrod zho dang bya gag shar mi 'phrod //
T13D4307:12a-4: de ltar 'phrod zas goms dang rtag tu chags pa dang //
T13D4307:12a-5: lang tsho 'ju slas zos dang nyung na gnod pa med dang bsre //
T13D4307:12a-6: 'phrod pa'i zas zos phyi dro'i las byas nam sros bde bar nyal //
T13D4307:12a-7: de ltar nan tan bag byas mi tshe tshad bzhin 'tsho nges pas //
T13D4307:12a-8: skyes nas lo bcu'i bar du sma mi dbab cing
T13D4307:12a-9: rang dgar gzhag / de nas nyi shu lon te
T13D4307:12a-10: lo bcur bslab dang brtsal bar bya //
T13D4307:12a-11: de nas lnga bcu lnga lon sum cu rtsa lnga khyud 'khor du //
T13D4307:12a-12: longs spyod grags pa'i yul srid gtam byas nas //
T13D4307:12a-13: lnga bcu lnga lon phyin chad chos lam yum gyi ched bsgrub phyir //
T13D4307:12a-14: dge la brtson bskyed thos rig goms byed lus sems ci bder gnas /
T13D4307:12a-15: de ltar sus nus mi lus thob pa'i don yod
T13D4307:12a-16: skyid cing dge / slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub
T13D4307:12a-17: snying pos sman pa rnams la brdzangs pa /
